rayburn.engine.dew.lang

Class DewInterpreter.DewLexer.LexicalTokens.ResourcePointerToken

    DewInterpreter.DewLexer.LexicalTokens

    public static class DewInterpreter.DewLexer.LexicalTokens.ResourcePointerToken
extends DewInterpreter.DewLexer.LexicalTokens.LexicalToken
    This class represents the location of a resource in the object-property tree.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DewInterpreter.DewLexer.LexicalTokens.ResourcePointerToken

        public DewInterpreter.DewLexer.LexicalTokens.ResourcePointerToken(int line,
                                                          int charInLine,
                                                          long scriptChar,
                                                          java.lang.String resourceDirectory)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        line - the line number of the token
        charInLine - the char position of the token in the line
        scriptChar - the total character position of the token
        resourceDirectory - The resource directory. For external resources this is simply a full or relative file directory. For internal resources, this is the tree directory. The object-property tree is made of AbstractDewEntityBindings and AbstractDewPropertyBindings. A valid directory might be objectName.subObjectName.propertyName.
